song.title: Jesus On E's
song.info:
Remix of the Jesus On E's soundtrack by Echo. Lyrics:
Ooh yeah! C'mon!
My warped senses tell me That nothing I see is real. Saturday tends to betray me Like a (??? suggester), you see. The time to wonder ceases: You'll (??? solely) see That your religion's based on Nothing but Jesus on E's.
Slam the door when you're leaving, So I'll know for sure that you're gone. ??? (will try to compel?) ??? force is set free.
Reality's razors will teach you That Satan is high on speed, And LSD will convince thee That Jesus was whacked on E's!
